excerpt: The TMCM-1260 is a single axis motor controller/driver board for 2-phase bipolar stepper motors with up-to 6A RMS motor current and 48V DC supply. It supports SixPoint™ ramps in addition to linear ramps.All you need to get started is a power supply and Trinamic's free and easy to use TMCL-IDE. This graphical user interface allows quick setup and supports the use of commands in direct mode, monitors real-time behavior visualized in graphs, and logs and stores data.More about the TMCL-IDESpecial FeaturesCoolStep™SpreadCycle™StealthChop™

Documentation: TMCL Firmware Manual for Firmware V1.44 Rev V1.02
CANopen Firmware Manual for Firmware V3.21 Rev V1.00
Software: CANopen Firmware V3.21 (hex and EDS file)
